subject: Basketball
Sneakers
Women and Girls
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Maya Moore, the former Connecticut star who signed with the W.N.B.A.’s Minnesota Lynx, became the first female basketball player to sign an endorsement deal with Jordan Brand.
snippet: Maya Moore, the former Connecticut star who signed with the W.N.B.A.’s Minnesota Lynx, became the first female basketball player to sign an endorsement deal with Jordan Brand.
